alert.note: Alert for East Carroll; Franklin; Madison; Morehouse; Richland; Tensas; West Carroll (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 4:46AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Morehouse, southwestern East Carroll, northwestern Tensas, western Madison, Richland, southwestern West Carroll and Franklin Parishes through 515 AM CST... At 445 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Start to Archibald to Jigger. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Rayville around 450 AM CST. Holly Ridge around 455 AM CST. Crowville around 500 AM CST. Delhi, Warden and Newlight around 505 AM CST. Goodwill, Darnell and Waverly around 510 AM CST. Monticello around 515 AM CST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Gilbert, Baskin, Pioneer, Oak Ridge and Epps. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: East Carroll; Franklin; Madison; Morehouse; Richland; Tensas; West Carroll
